name: Revenge of Zelenskyy
description:
You play as president Zelenskyy on a one man mission to stop the evil president Putin from continuing to invade your precious home country!

Shoot and explode your way through multiple enemies while dodging and fighting a flying Putin with bombs.

How to play! - Revenge of Zelenskyy

Move using WASD controls.

Jump using "Space Bar" or "w". 

Aim using your mouse pointer.

Shoot using Left Click (Mouse 1)

Switch weapons using Scrollwheel

Credits:
